3. Platinum: This is a chemical element (symbol Pt) that is used in some chemotherapy drugs, such as cisplatin and carboplatin.
4. Erythrodysesthesia: Also known as "hand-foot syndrome," this is a side effect of certain chemotherapy drugs, characterized by redness, swelling, and pain on the palms of the hands and soles of the feet.
5. Stomatitis: This is a medical condition characterized by inflammation and soreness of the mucous membranes in the mouth. It can be a side effect of chemotherapy.
